data.name: The Chromatic Scale shows all 12 notes. The inner numbers (1-7) highlight the notes of the minor scale for the selected key.
data.value: The Chromatic Scale displays all 12 notes. The inner numbers (1-7) highlight the notes of the minor scale for the selected key.

data.name: The Circle of Fifths organizes keys based on perfect fifths. Rotating this circle demonstrates how keys are related. Each click (a 'fifth') adds or removes one sharp/flat from the key signature.
data.value: The Circle of Fifths organises keys based on perfect fifths. Rotating this circle demonstrates how keys are related. Each click (a 'fifth') adds or removes one sharp/flat from the key signature.

data.name: The Interactive Piano will automatically highlight all the notes (and their scale degrees) for the selected key.
data.value: The Interactive Piano will automatically highlight all the notes (and their scale degrees) for the selected key.

data.name: The Key Signature display shows the correct sharps or flats for the key on both the treble and bass clefs.
data.value: The Key Signature display shows the correct sharps or flats for the key on both the treble and bass clefs.

data.name: This tool helps you visualize music theory. It connects the Chromatic Scale, the Circle of Fifths, the piano keyboard, and standard music notation all in one place.
data.value: This tool helps you visualise music theory. It connects the Chromatic Scale, the Circle of Fifths, the piano keyboard, and standard music notation all in one place.

data.name: Use the 'Rotate' buttons under either circle to select a new key.
data.value: Use the 'Rotate' buttons beneath either circle to select a new key.
